General.Name: Moonbae Steel
General.Description: Moonbaesteel Co.,Ltd engages in the manufacture and distribution of steel plate material, section, and scale products in Korea. It offers hot rolled thick and thin plates, patterned steel plates, hot rolled coils, mini mills, thick and thin plates, patterns, and section steel products. Moonbaesteel Co.,Ltd was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
